articles.title: Benjamin Woodcock: Australian man extradited from Croatia to face court in Perth on drug charge - PerthNow
articles.description: A Perth man who has allegedly been on the run from police for 12 years lived in multiple countries before finally being arrested in Europe.
articles.content:
A 43-year-old man has been extradited from Croatia to Perth to face a drug charge dating back more than a decade.
